channel.title: CVE Feed for Dassault Systèmes -- DELMIA Apriso
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dassault Systèmes -- DELMIA Apriso

item.title: CVE-2023-2140|2024-08-02T06:12:20.445Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- delmia%20apriso
item.description:
A Server-Side Request Forgery vulnerability in DELMIA Apriso Release 2017 through Release 2022
could allow an unauthenticated attacker to issue requests to arbitrary hosts on behalf of the server running the DELMIA Apriso application.

item.title: CVE-2023-2139|2024-08-02T06:12:20.521Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- delmia%20apriso
item.description: A reflected Cross-site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability in DELMIA Apriso Release 2017 through Release 2022 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary script code.

item.title: CVE-2023-2141|2024-08-02T06:12:20.488Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- delmia%20apriso
item.description: An unsafe .NET object deserialization in DELMIA Apriso Release 2017 through Release 2022 could lead to post-authentication remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-3301|2024-05-30T15:18:14.217Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- delmia%20apriso
item.description: An unsafe .NET object deserialization vulnerability in DELMIA Apriso Release 2019 through Release 2024 could lead to post-authentication remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-3300|2024-06-04T17:33:17.300Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- delmia%20apriso
item.description: An unsafe .NET object deserialization vulnerability in DELMIA Apriso Release 2019 through Release 2024 could lead to pre-authentication remote code execution.
